alert.note: Alert for Butler; Clarke; Conecuh; Monroe; Wilcox (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 10 at 3:56PM CDT until June 10 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Butler County in south central Alabama... Monroe County in south central Alabama... East central Clarke County in southwestern Alabama... Southeastern Wilcox County in south central Alabama... Conecuh County in south central Alabama... * Until 445 PM CDT. * At 355 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles east of Fulton to 11 miles northwest of Peterman to 4 miles west of Monroeville to Frisco City to 6 miles northwest of Uriah, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Monroeville, Evergreen, Frisco City, Peterman, Georgiana, Excel, Beatrice, Vredenburgh, Repton and I65 And US 84. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
